reviews.review: I enjoy the teamwork needed to win competitive matches. This is a very non-tilting game so it is good for the casual players. The community is not toxic which is very refreshing and players are often welcoming to new players in competitive matches.

The game is great, with good shooting and survival tactics, you could only add more weapons. I hope that the players who participate in the inspection, finally ban hackers, because this game is no longer enough to play with so many hackers that, for God's sake, what is the use of spending money to buy the operation pass? Shattered Web, from cs: go, if you can't even play this game, I hope the creators of that game are aware of that. If all hackers were punished, at least everyone could play cs: go fairly. If not the cs: go community, it will continue to be extremely toxic, like a Crossfire of life.
